text: Mansha imetuwone it etts tewud doon it imiruwo it k'aniyitwok'o itsh bogawitwok'owa etaat eshwaanots taayere shino itok boweetwok'o wosho b́ geyiko b́wottsok'o daatsre, mank'oon taa twoor tewudi dowon it imetuwo k'anke b́wotiti, itwere it imet angnon b́woterawo shunon b́wottsok'owoniye b́kitsiti.
